title: Razorpine
summaries: The Razorpine is a post-Plantera magic weapon that rapid-fires 2-4 "pine needle" projectiles at high velocity. The projectiles drop off after a modest distance, much like Throwing Knives and the Magic Dagger, though with slightly longer range. The Razorpine has a 3.11% to 7.78% / 6.22% to 31.11% chance of being dropped by Everscream during the Frost Moon event.

statistics.Damage: 48 / 58 (Magic)
statistics.Sell: 9
